name: Lucky Golf (1mate, qlnkzy, Schuubi)
description:
This is a simple golf game, in which your "strength" is randomly chosen by dice roll.

How to play?
The goal is to get the ball to the "finish" flag. To achieve this, roll the dice and choose the direction (with your mouse) in which the ball should move (note that you need to place the mouse "behind" the ball).

Notes:
There are 9 levels (only) 8 levels and no persistence, which means there is no "real" scoreboard. The game is developed for Windows (Native), which leads to some functionalities being broken in the HTML5 version (e.g.: "Exit", "Screen resolution").

Required inputs:

  • Keyboard
  • Mouse
